dialogue.start: Hello fellow traveler! Welcome to the land of "______". We know your journy from "_____" was long and trecherous, but we have great work to do since we're spread thin here. I read your papers and saw that you're a great explorer, and it seems we have great use for you. Please report to "_____" down at the armory, he'll tell you what to do next.
dialogue.active: You're still here? "_____" is down at the "_____", please don't keep him waiting.
dialogue.delivered: Greetings, nice to see you around you've made yourself at home in "_____".
